attributes.action: Stop new ruls of spouse visa financial requirements, as it spilt our families
attributes.additional_details: I contributed in Tax, NI, i made contribution to UK economy through manage increase the company profit that i working with them that is mean more tax to UK gov, however with all that i am trying to earn more that 31,000 but nobody pay.
attributes.background: New spouse visa rule or financial requirements will damage our mental health, split our family, make families insecure. I am working hard since i came UK on 2020, have high capability, couldn't get more than £31,000 per year.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition -

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
